content.detailedDescription: (my english is60nt very good, because ib4m a german boy!)1. i was in a car and heard music with my cd-player.2. istared at the objekt and could60nt move and speak.3. i thought, this is a plane, but a sekunde later, idropped this idea.4. i was paralized, i could60nt mover and speak. and i was scared. after the sightning, i could mover, buti was scared. i thought: when i told this other people, they lought about me!Because that, i heard music and did60nt tell it to other people.5. it was north-west of me and flies slowly towest. it was blue, oval, and had a corona of blue light around itself. it glowedblue. after 20-25 seconds, the objekt sparkled one turn blue and acceleratedwith an incredible speed and raced to west and stepped.6. it raced so fast, thati lost sight of the objekt after two or three seconds!
content.summary: Blue ufo

content.detailedDescription: i walked outside to smoke a cig and looked upbecause i just heard about the phonicx lights and i saw this red light go flyingover i know it was not a aircraft it had no blinking lights it was going to fastto be a normal plane and it was very low it made no sound at all it just flewout of sight i yelled at my friends in the house but it was to late it was gone

content.detailedDescription: It  was about  4:45 in the morning driving down 17th ave. i was in the back ofthe car smoking a cigarette i just happend to look up and there was this largsize flat thing moving above us i said what is that as it moved farther away icould see it was a pyramyd shape and with one amazingly bright white light onedimmer and one red it flew backward so to speak the piont to the end and flat tothe front it was close enough to see the detail in the black metal with almostgrecian designs amazingly scary and a remarcable experiance,though now 3 dayslater parts of that night are hazey i can almost feel there is more there butcant remeber it. we live in a rural area lots of field it moved slow to the s/ethen  to the south stoped as if watching us from about 1 feild away followed usfor about 5 to 10  minutes then left at a very highspeed in almost a splitsecond.
content.summary: Black pyramyd  with three lights red two wight  no

content.detailedDescription: My cousin and i were in my front yard talking when we both saw 3 faint lightscome from the dark, quiet sky.  i first thought they were 3 birds gliding.  thenthese lights got closer to us and then started toward the west.  that92s when we noticed, since the moon was toward the west, that these lights wereon the bottom of a (equilateral) triangular shaped object.  the object thenappeared to turn on one of its sides and started moving west.  all sides of theobject were equal in length and flat on all sides, including the top and bottom. it seemed to be about 25-50 feet thick with equal sides about 150-200 feet longeach, and it had no fins or rudders.  the lights we saw on the object were alsoequally spaced on the object in a triangular pattern.  then we watched as itdisappeared (traveled) to the west.    all this happened within about 30 secondsand with no sound.
content.summary: Saw  a triangular shaped object directly above my

content.detailedDescription: I was coming back home from the vacation with my family and we were in the car.We were near the capital city baku. but hadnt eneterd to the city yet. it wassuburb. and suddenly i noticed a light with a bow-shaped trajectory. it rised alittle and then came down while changing its golden colour to red. then in 10seconds it disappeared. i showed it to my parents who were siting near to me.And we thought that it was a ufo. i didnt feel anything special. nobody did, ithink, except my mother. she was a little afraid and nothing else.
content.summary: I saw a light that i think was a ufo

content.detailedDescription: Object appeared at sundown from the west, rose as the stars did travelling inwest to east dir. stopped/slowed at pos almost directly overhead began randomflight path with minor but defininte direction changes. at times would move instraight line then would turn in clockwise direction then stop, turn otherdirection. at times during turns, increase in speed was observed.Object wouldthen slow down and continue flight. object continued to travel in randomdirections never the same, no onserved pattern. was unlike sattelite movementpossible space station although am unaware of actual position. movement did notseem to be reflection w/ angle of light change.Ex.Light reflected fromcylindrical object moving erraticly
content.summary: Bright object, random seemingly controlled flight.

content.detailedDescription: First i have to say that i am not sure that i really saw anything at all. itsjust that for the past three months i have been thinking over and over aboutthat night and the possibility that i saw something has been eating away at me.Mostly because if it was something i should report it. so here is whathappened.It was around 9:25-30pm on the evening of may 6th. i was in my(upstairs) bedroom and i just happened to get up and look out the window. it wasdark so i cant give a totally clear description of what i saw, but i did see anobject. and at first it looked like a plane, but as i watched i saw a red lightthat went around it in a clockwise motion. i actually stood there and watched asthe light traveled around it which makes me think it was a saucer or somethinground. i dont know how long i watched itanywhere from a minute or more, but it just hovered and didnt move. thenfinally it just floated away. during the whole time i couldt move. i reallycouldnt believe what i was looking at. to me it looked like a ufo, orsomething, but like i said it was dark and im not sure if it was military orwhat. you see i live 40 minutes away from carswell air force base. i guess i wasin shock, but i just stared at it and my mind was telling my to get my camera,but my feet wouldnt move. and then later i kicked myself for not taking apicture. thats part of the reason i waited so long, because i didnt get apicture. and i dont want people to think i am some kind of nut who alwaysreports these kind of things. you see i reported something last winter under afalse name of michelle muller. well the last name was false. but like i said thepossiblity that i saw something has been bothering me and so thats why imcontacting you.
content.summary: Saw red light from my bedroom window

content.detailedDescription: Traveling east on old route 60 in truck with mother at dusk.  still light outand sky clear but sun went behind mountains.  i looked out windshield to seefirst star to make wish.  i saw dull grey triangle with rounded corners, dome incenter of underside, and multi-colored flashing lights around rim almostdirectly above us.  i said, mom.  what the hell is that?  she looked and said,oh my god!  oh my god! and i told her to pull over.  we pulled over in front of7-eleven and got out.  ufo was moving slowly overhead to ne with no sound.  ilooked around to see if anyone else saw it but no one was looking (one guy waswalking into 7-eleven).  the craft travelled in straight line slowly ne untiltip of front went over mountain.  it looked as if it was direclty over themountain very close.  then it shot off at ungodly speed in that direction anddisappeared.
content.summary: Unidentified flying triangle in 1980s

content.detailedDescription: I believe it was a meteorite, i know that it is the season. however, i thoughtthat it was really close, and definitely burned up or skipped by. it seemed verylarge and was directly over saint john for a few seconds, as it shot by, so ihoped this information would help. i was on my back deck facing north east, stargazing.
content.summary: Meteorite streaked accross the local sky!

content.detailedDescription: Original witness narrative:me and 4 other friends were in my backyard around the fire.  they were alltalking about stuff while i was leaning back in my chair looking for shootingstars.  out of the corner of my eye, in the south sky, i seen a slow movinglight at first i thought it was a shooting star but realized it was a littlebigger and changed from red to orange to white in a matter of seconds.  itlooked as though it was enflamed, it shot out something that from our distancelooked like a spark at the same time one of my friends shouted obscenities indisbelief.  we seen it go under a cloud as it shot sparks two more times eachabout a half second apart.  then it abruptly slowed down and sped up to where itsuddenly disappeared.  the object left a small flaming tail but was too low inmy opinion to be space junk.  it was an almost perfect triangle with roundededges.  it was heading between south and southeast and only lasted a fewseconds.  i am reporting this because i honestly cant think of anything else itcould be.
content.summary: Student sees fb1 with sparks seen in bridgman, mic

content.detailedDescription: It occurred sometime back, when i was attending hs in lima, peru, s.A.  it was aholiday break period in early october 1979.  i was retreiving some clothingitems from the laundry patio outside the house we lived, when i turn up to thesky south, and notice at a distance 3 triangular blurry like white light objecttogether hovering over slowly.  the sky was overcast and cloudy.  i saw themflying over and pass the house and continued south west direction toward theocean.  about a minute or so later, i heard the engine of a fighther jet flewover uswe lived near an airforce base at that time, and saw the peruvian airforcemirage jet follow the same path of the triangular shape objects.  we have hadjets flown over the area many times, but this one was shortly after those 3objects passed over the area.  i had told this to my mother at that time, andthen my dad, since he was in the military.  the local tv did not mentionedanything, nor any other one of the neighbors kids saw anything.  i thougth youmight want to record this event for your research.  i dont recall any soundcoming out when the 3 objects hover over the house, only the juet engine rightafter they passed.
content.summary: Bright white light triangular shape objects in 3 f

content.detailedDescription: at app. 4am i and 3 friends observed 3 pinpointobjects hovering in the myrtle beach area. they were emitting light that variedred, white, green, and blue. they were at a high altitude. one was north of ourlocation, one was north east, and the other was south west. the objects seemedto stay in the same position, but wobbled from left to righ continuously. weobserved this for nearly one hour.
content.summary: I saw 3 pinpoint objects hovering at a high altitu

content.detailedDescription: Summary from phone conversations with witnesses:witnesses were in the backyard of a residence star gazing when they noticed astar shaped object shimmering in the sky.  a telescope was then set up to get abetter view of this object and allowed the witnesses to determine that therewere actually 8 disk shaped objects arranged in a geometric pattern rather thanone single object.  the objects were stationary and hovering and seemed to bereflecting light rather than being self illuminated.  they described them aspopping in and out of sight and the objects changed the shape of the geometricpattern they were in.Female witness described them as being in a zig zag pattern and they changedpatterns 3 times.  she also stated that previous to seeing them through thetelescope she believed it to be only one object rather than 8 seperate objects. she stated that she had severe headaches 22 hrs after the event which havebecome quite bothersome and will be seeking medical assistance for thiscondition and is currently on migraine medication.  the second male witness described the object as a bright light which was movingand stopping which had a fainter light following it or circling it.  thiswitness watched it for about 5-10 minutes but didnt observe the objects throughthe telescope.
content.summary: 4 people witnessed a shining objects high in the s
